group_1.textLeft: Hum...

group_1.textRight: Nnn...

group_1.textLeft: Felicia, you're being too lazy.
You should get up and do something, too,@Tsuruno.

group_1.textRight: What's the big dealâ€¦?@It's still New Year's, y'know.

group_1.textLeft: You've been saying that for three days now.@How much longer will New Year's last?

group_1.textRight: Oh...
January 31st sounds good, right?
New Year's Day, New Year's Month...@What's the difference?

group_1.textLeft: I can think of more than a few.
But I think I'd like to take it easy, too.
Whenever I think about school starting@up again, I feel nervous...

group_1.textRight: I think my jitters are getting the best@of me...
I don't mean...that I hate school,@it's just...
I always get so anxious before the new@semester begins.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, exactly.
I'm...feeling a little uneasy, too...

group_1.textRight: You too, Ui...?

group_1.textLeft: It's not because you don't like school,@right?

group_1.textRight: Oh, no! That's not what I meant.
I just feel like there's something I need@to do over winter break,
but I can't remember what it's supposed@to be...so it's making me nervous.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, I see... I think I've been in that@position before.

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle* When it comes to these things,@I often don't remember until it's too late.

group_1.textLeft: I-I have to remember somehow...!

group_1.textRight: Does it have to do with your homework?

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...@No, I think I finished everything.
Huh?

group_1.textRight: What's wrong, Sis?

group_1.textLeft: I feel like there's really...
I'm starting to think there's something@important I'm forgetting, too.

group_1.textRight: Oh, really? It's not about homework@for you either, right?

group_1.textLeft: Well, it's possible, but...I feel like it was@something that involved you, actually.

group_1.textRight: So maybe we're trying to remember@the same thing...?

group_1.textLeft: That might be the case.

group_1.textRight: ...What could both of you have forgotten?
They really are cut from the same cloth...

group_1.textLeft: ...[chara:100202:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:100202:cheek_0][chara:100202:face_mtn_ex_051.exp.json][chara:100202:lipSynch_1]Oh, could it be...
Does it have to do with cleaning?

group_1.textRight: Figures.
You're not in a New Year's mood,@you're in a year's end mood!

group_1.textLeft: Oh! That's it! Cleaning!
We need to clean our house in Takarazaki!

group_1.textRight: That's right!
We're home!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* We're back!

group_1.textRight: Hey, no one's living here now, right?

group_1.textLeft: I've had the key, but there's been no reason@to come back here.
My mom and dad haven't been home@all year either,
so that means no one's been in for a while.

group_1.textRight: What's the point of cleaning, then?
It doesn't...seem like it should get dirty, but...

group_1.textLeft: "A house hurts when no one lives in it."

group_1.textRight: Huh? Why's that?

group_1.textLeft: The buildup of rust and dust can@cause damage,
so you need to do maintenance at least@once a year.
Yeah, I'd hate to come back to a broken-down@house.
Um, well, I want to ask again just@to be sure...
Can you guys please help us clean@our house?

group_1.textRight: Pretty please!
Of course we will!@Let's do our best, guys!
